title: Major Jhin Trap Issues!!!11!1!
body:
https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Rge_V40pF94/WJJTihHpZpI/AAAAAAABBmU/dxRM_rMEMC4wc8woEUSFYLrOad236OsigCLcB/s1600/3333.jpg

This is just WRONG! 
It should be 4 moons building a trap!
It must be 
##perfection

replies.body: Each mark is a timer leading up to the fourth thing: the explosion
Good save, we fourgive you

I was about to correct you for spelling it wrong...
But don't worry...
You right.
I was about to correct you four spelling it wrong, you mean.

I should have fourseen that explanation!
Still thanks four the insight. ~~<3 ~~    <4
:D
Three traps for the moon, one man for the star.

Please keep the posts here at an organized amount of likes equal to 4.
or minus 4 just keep it 4 IT MUST BE

perfection.

> [{quoted}](name=snarin,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=7vzleoKQ,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2017-02-02T14:55:17.591+0000)
>
> The background is red, too. Are you describing turkish flag?

*Psst* They're onto us!
Thats actually beautiful.
Technically, it's three moons and a single glowing object in the middle, for a grand total of four objects.

Oh look, you even have 4 dislikes! 

> perfection
I got dislikes? Dang, it was just a joke.
It's just a hunch, but I think people around here struggle to see certain jokes, but it's not jhintirely their fault...
I love Jhin threads with perfect 4 upvotes, but then I hate it too because I can't upvote them further.
This perfectly describes why I am laughing so hard at this whole thread is that everyone has 4 upvotes.
If I had a dollar for every thread about Jhin and the number 4...
when you see a Jhin thread but can't upvote because the comment and replies are at 4 already

You'd only get 4 dollars! 
#perfection
I think you mean $44.44.
you'd have 4 quarters
You even have 4 upvotes. lol

It's 5 on live :x

This was the only way to achieve perfection, they must make this skin have 3 so that it redeems them for the 5 and cancels out to make 4.

You cannot cancel something out. 
Either it is 4, or it is ugly!
So live Jhin needs tweaks too then hmm.... more serious than we thought.
i laughed so hard i am writing from hospital now
Well I mean none of his other traps have 4 points either so...
This is a disgrace. {{champion:202}} {{item:3070}}

Is it just me or do the moons look funky if up close.
They remind me of Line Rider
Is the skin live? Or is this still from pbe ?

the skin isn't live yet. 
I'd guess next weekend the skins will get released

But ALAS!!! 
"My genius will be understood...eventually" {{champion:202}}

Quite peculiar. {{champion:161}}
every jhin related post must have a 4 or 44 for the sake of perfection

"Where's the fourth one?"
{{champion:202}} - "I was thinking I could use a bullet to draw a new moon between your eyes..."
